long_description.example:
The Puppy Wellness Plan Includes:
  • 3 Complete Physical Exams
  • Core Vaccination Series as Recommended by Your Veterinarian - Includes 5-in-1 (DAP/Parvo), Lepto 4, Bordetella and Rabies
  • 2 Fecal Tests
  • 2 Deworming Treatments - Roundworms and Hookworms
  • Microchip I.D. and Registration

get.summary: Generate a new agreement document to complete contract application. Requires contract application ID.

207.description: Agreement uploads to partner, but cannot be stored in S3 bucket

post.summary: Upload a signed agreement document to S3 bucket

400.description: Bad request, agreement ID not present

post.summary: Initiate a new application and retrieve agreement document

200.description: Initiate a new application and retrieve agreement document

207.description: Agreement uploads to partner, but cannot be stored in S3 bucket

put.summary: Finalize a contract application after submitting a signed agreement document

get.summary: Retrieve a list of existing contract applications
Show a single contract application given an ID

put.summary: Update an existing contract application. Used to modify fields and complete the application. Contract applications with a status of 5 are converted to finalized contracts.

200.description: Update or finalize an existing contract application

delete.summary: Cancel an open contract application. Completed contracts cannot be canceled.

get.summary: Show a single contract given an ID

parameters.name: is_sellable
parameters.description: Plan is active and within date range

parameters.name: age
parameters.description: Age in years. Accepts integer years, YYMM formatted strings (i.e. "3Y1M"), and datetime strings (i.e. "2016-11-22T21:45:58+00:00")

get.summary: Retrieve a single plan by ID
